definition: formed or united into a whole, to make into a whole or make part of a whole
details:
adjective
- formed or united into a whole
= synonyms: integrated
verb
- to make into a whole or make part of a whole
= example: to make into a whole or make part of a whole
= synonyms: integrate
- unite or merge with something already in existence
= example: unite or merge with something already in existence
- form a corporation
- include or contain
= synonyms: contain, comprise
